title: Impact of temperature and residence time on sewage sludge pyrolysis for combined carbon sequestration and energy production
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): M. Halalsheh, K. Shatanawi, R. Shawabkeh, G. Kassab, H. Mohammad, M. Adawi, S. Ababneh, A. Abdullah, N. Ghantous, N. Balah, S. Almomani
